meanings.definition: A fried dough pastry typically served with sugar or cinnamon.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat churros at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells delicious churros every morning.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last churro.
meanings.sent4: The churros were like golden sticks of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly fried churros filled the air.

meanings.sent2: She churros with delight at the street food festival.
meanings.sent3: He churros so quickly, he almost forgot to breathe.
meanings.sent4: Churros the happiness of a sunny day at the park.
meanings.sent5: Churros slowly to savor every bite of sweetness.
